resources.string: %1$s requires one or more Google Play services that are not currently available. Please contact the developer for assistance.
%1$s won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet.
The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account.
A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
Google Play services requires an action
Accessing accounts from a restricted profile is not supported.
Error signing in the specified account. Please choose a different account.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. If the problem persists, please contact the developer for assistance.
%1$s relies on Google Play services, which is not supported by your device. Contact the manufacturer for assistance.
%1$s won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are currently updating.
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
Deleting a guide CANNOT be undone. Are you sure you want to delete \"%1$s\"?
One or more images are still loading and will not be deleted from the server.
One or more fields are still empty.
Image is empty, try a different image or upload a new one.
It looks like an error occurred.
You haven\'t favorited any guides yet.
You have insufficient privileges to perform this action.
Exiting will cancel any changes you have made.
Cannot save step until line content is added.
Add content to current step before creating a new step.
What is this guide specifically about? Describe the component, thing or idea that you are describing about this %1$s.
What is this guide specifically about? Describe the component, thing or idea that you are describing about this %1$s .
For example - Screen, Battery, Spark Plugs, etc
In a sentence or two, describe what this guide is about.
Generated title from the type, %1$s and focus. Only edit if you aren\'t happy with what\'s there.
What %1$s are you working on? For example, is it a \"iPhone 4\" or a \"Kenmore Washing Machine\"? If the %2$s already exists, be sure to select it from the prepopulated list.
Image saved to your media manager.
Your device was disconnected for the current session
An error was occurred during pairing, please contact Insert support
Your changes could not be saved because the content you are editing has changed since you last opened it. Please remake your changes and try again.
Invalid login. Check your email address and password to verify they are correct.
Are you sure you want to delete %1$d %2$s?
This media manager is linked directly to your %1$s account. Any pictures you load into here will be available to you in your guide creation endeavors.
It looks like you don\'t have any guides. Create a guide by tapping the icon in the action bar or in the menu drawer.
No images in your Media Manager. Add images with the icons above!
Get started by favoriting a guide.\n\nYour Favorite guides will be saved for offline viewing.
Images must be at least 800x600 pixels and local to your device. Valid formats are .png, .jpg, .jpeg, and .gif.
The requested data does not exist.
An error has occurred while trying to load content from our servers.
I agree to release my contributions under our open license.
Are you sure you want to delete this line?
Are you sure you want to delete Step %1$d?
You must agree to the terms.
You can only upload four files at a time. Please wait for your current uploads to finish to upload another file.
Are you sure you want to unfavorite this guide?
